{"config": null, "language": "plpgsql", "signature": "decrement_exam_count()", "return_type": "trigger", "source_length": 226, "source_preview": "
BEGIN
    -- تقليل عدد الاختبارات للمعلم (لا يقل عن صفر)
    UPDATE profiles 
    SET exam_count = GREATEST(COALESCE(exam_count, 0) - 1, 0),
        updated_at = NOW()
    WHERE id = OLD.created_by;
    
    RETURN OLD;
END;
", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.decrement_exam_count()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- تقليل عدد الاختبارات للمعلم (لا يقل عن صفر)
    UPDATE profiles 
    SET exam_count = GREATEST(COALESCE(exam_count, 0) - 1, 0),
        updated_at = NOW()
    WHERE id = OLD.created_by;
    
    RETURN OLD;
END;
$function$
", "transform_types": null, "argument_defaults": null}

{"config": null, "language": "plpgsql", "signature": "get_page_words_with_highlights_v2(p_user_id uuid, p_page_id character varying, p_language_code character varying)", "return_type": "TABLE(word_uuid uuid, word_id character varying, word_text text, word_context text, word_position integer, is_highlighted boolean, highlighted_at timestamp with time zone)", "source_length": 764, "source_preview": "
DECLARE
    v_page_data JSONB;
BEGIN
    -- جلب بيانات الصفحة للمستخدم
    SELECT COALESCE(
        highlighted_words->p_language_code->p_page_id,
        '{}'::jsonb
    )
    INTO v_page_data
    FROM user_word_highlights
    WHERE user_id = p_user_id;
    
    v_page_data := COALESCE(v_page_data, '{}'::jsonb);
    
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        pw.id AS word_uuid,
        pw.word_id,
        pw.word_text,
        pw.word_context,
        pw.word_position,
        (v_page_data ? pw.word_id) AS is_highlighted,
        (v_page_data->pw.word_id->>'at')::TIMESTAMPTZ AS highlighted_at
    FROM page_words pw
    WHERE pw.page_id = p_page_id
      AND pw.language_code = p_language_code
      AND pw.is_active = true
    ORDER BY pw.word_position;
END;
", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_page_words_with_highlights_v2(p_user_id uuid, p_page_id character varying, p_language_code character varying)
 RETURNS TABLE(word_uuid uuid, word_id character varying, word_text text, word_context text, word_position integer, is_highlighted boolean, highlighted_at timestamp with time zone)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_page_data JSONB;
BEGIN
    -- جلب بيانات الصفحة للمستخدم
    SELECT COALESCE(
        highlighted_words->p_language_code->p_page_id,
        '{}'::jsonb
    )
    INTO v_page_data
    FROM user_word_highlights
    WHERE user_id = p_user_id;
    
    v_page_data := COALESCE(v_page_data, '{}'::jsonb);
    
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        pw.id AS word_uuid,
        pw.word_id,
        pw.word_text,
        pw.word_context,
        pw.word_position,
        (v_page_data ? pw.word_id) AS is_highlighted,
        (v_page_data->pw.word_id->>'at')::TIMESTAMPTZ AS highlighted_at
    FROM page_words pw
    WHERE pw.page_id = p_page_id
      AND pw.language_code = p_language_code
      AND pw.is_active = true
    ORDER BY pw.word_position;
END;
$function$
", "transform_types": null, "argument_defaults": null}

details:
{"config": ["search_path=public"], "language": "plpgsql", "signature": "get_student_exam_attempts(p_student_id uuid DEFAULT NULL::uuid)", "return_type": "jsonb", "source_length": 2297, "source_preview": "
DECLARE
  v_target_student_id UUID;
  v_student_stage_id UUID;
  v_comprehensive JSONB;
  v_teacher JSONB;
BEGIN
  v_target_student_id := COALESCE(p_student_id, auth.uid());
  
  IF v_target_student_id IS NULL THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'User not authenticated';
  END IF;

  -- Get the student's educational stage
  SELECT educational_stage_id INTO v_student_stage_id
  FROM profiles
  WHERE id = v_target_student_id;

  -- Fetch site exams (comprehensive_exams) - filtered by stage
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'attempt_id', ca.id,
      'exam_id', ca.exam_id,
      'exam_title', ce.exam_title,
      'stage_id', ce.stage_id,
      'total_score', ca.total_score,
      'max_score', ca.max_score,
      'percentage', ca.percentage,
      'status', ca.status,
      'completed_at', ca.completed_at,
      'answered_count', ca.answered_count
    ) ORDER BY ca.completed_at DESC NULLS LAST
  ), '[]'::jsonb) INTO v_comprehensive
  FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts ca
  JOI", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_student_exam_attempts(p_student_id uuid DEFAULT NULL::uuid)
 RETURNS jsonb
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
DECLARE
  v_target_student_id UUID;
  v_student_stage_id UUID;
  v_comprehensive JSONB;
  v_teacher JSONB;
BEGIN
  v_target_student_id := COALESCE(p_student_id, auth.uid());
  
  IF v_target_student_id IS NULL THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'User not authenticated';
  END IF;

  -- Get the student's educational stage
  SELECT educational_stage_id INTO v_student_stage_id
  FROM profiles
  WHERE id = v_target_student_id;

  -- Fetch site exams (comprehensive_exams) - filtered by stage
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'attempt_id', ca.id,
      'exam_id', ca.exam_id,
      'exam_title', ce.exam_title,
      'stage_id', ce.stage_id,
      'total_score', ca.total_score,
      'max_score', ca.max_score,
      'percentage', ca.percentage,
      'status', ca.status,
      'completed_at', ca.completed_at,
      'answered_count', ca.answered_count
    ) ORDER BY ca.completed_at DESC NULLS LAST
  ), '[]'::jsonb) INTO v_comprehensive
  FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts ca
  JOIN comprehensive_exams ce ON ce.id = ca.exam_id
  WHERE ca.student_id = v_target_student_id
    -- Filter by stage: show if exam has no stage OR matches student's stage
    AND (ce.stage_id IS NULL OR v_student_stage_id IS NULL OR ce.stage_id = v_student_stage_id);

  -- Fetch teacher exams - filtered by stage
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'attempt_id', ta.id,
      'exam_id', ta.exam_id,
      'exam_title', te.exam_title,
      'stage_id', te.stage_id,
      'teacher_id', te.created_by,
      'teacher_name', p.name,
      'total_score', ta.total_score,
      'max_score', ta.max_score,
      'percentage', ta.percentage,
      'status', ta.status,
      'completed_at', ta.completed_at,
      'answered_count', ta.answered_count
    ) ORDER BY ta.completed_at DESC NULLS LAST
  ), '[]'::jsonb) INTO v_teacher
  FROM teacher_exam_attempts ta
  JOIN teacher_exams te ON te.id = ta.exam_id
  JOIN profiles p ON p.id = te.created_by
  WHERE ta.student_id = v_target_student_id
    -- Filter by stage: show if exam has no stage OR matches student's stage
    AND (te.stage_id IS NULL OR v_student_stage_id IS NULL OR te.stage_id = v_student_stage_id);

  RETURN jsonb_build_object(
    'comprehensive_exams', v_comprehensive,
    'teacher_exams', v_teacher
  );
END;
$function$
", "transform_types": null, "argument_defaults": ["NULL::uuid"]}

        (
            SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
                (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jsonb_object_keys(page_value))

DECLARE
  v_student_id UUID := auth.uid();
  v_result RECORD;
BEGIN
  IF v_student_id IS NULL THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'User not authenticated';
  END IF;

  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts 
    WHERE id = p_attempt_id 
      AND student_id = v_student_id 
      AND status = 'in_progress'
  ) THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'Invalid attempt or already submitted';
  END IF;

  WITH scores AS (
    SELECT 
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'points_earned')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'points_earned')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS total_score,
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'max_points')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'max_points')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS max_score
    FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts ca,
         jsonb_each(ca.answers)
    WHERE ca.id = p_attempt_id
  )
  UPDATE comprehensive_exam_attempts
  SET 
    total_score = scores.total_score,
    max_score = scores.ma", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.submit_comprehensive_exam_attempt(p_attempt_id uuid)
 RETURNS jsonb
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
DECLARE
  v_student_id UUID := auth.uid();
  v_result RECORD;
BEGIN
  IF v_student_id IS NULL THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'User not authenticated';
  END IF;

  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts 
    WHERE id = p_attempt_id 
      AND student_id = v_student_id 
      AND status = 'in_progress'
  ) THEN
    RAISE EXCEPTION 'Invalid attempt or already submitted';
  END IF;

  WITH scores AS (
    SELECT 
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'points_earned')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'points_earned')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS total_score,
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'max_points')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'max_points')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS max_score
    FROM comprehensive_exam_attempts ca,
         jsonb_each(ca.answers)
    WHERE ca.id = p_attempt_id
  )
  UPDATE comprehensive_exam_attempts
  SET 
    total_score = scores.total_score,
    max_score = scores.max_score,
    percentage = CASE 
      WHEN scores.max_score > 0 
      THEN ROUND((scores.total_score::numeric / scores.max_score) * 100, 2)
      ELSE 0
    END,
    status = 'submitted',
    completed_at = NOW()
  FROM scores
  WHERE comprehensive_exam_attempts.id = p_attempt_id
  RETURNING comprehensive_exam_attempts.total_score, comprehensive_exam_attempts.max_score, comprehensive_exam_attempts.percentage 
  INTO v_result;

  RETURN jsonb_build_object(
    'success', true,
    'total_score', v_result.total_score,
    'max_score', v_result.max_score,
    'percentage', v_result.percentage
  );
END;
$function$
", "transform_types": null, "argument_defaults": null}

    SELECT 
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'points_earned')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'points_earned')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS total_score,
      COALESCE(SUM(
        COALESCE((value->'auto'->>'max_points')::int, 0) +
        COALESCE((value->'manual'->>'max_points')::int, 0)
      ), 0)::integer AS max_score
    FROM teacher_exam_attempts ta,
         jsonb_each(ta.answers)
    WHERE ta.id = p_attempt_id
  )
  UPDATE teacher_exam_attempts
  SET 
    total_score = scores.total_score,
    max_score = scores.max_score,
    percentage = CASE 
      WHEN scores.max_score > 0 
      THEN ROUND((scores.total_score::numeric / scores.max_score) * 100, 2)
      ELSE 0
    END,
    status = 'submitted',
    completed_at = NOW()
  FROM scores
  WHERE teacher_exam_attempts.id = p_attempt_id
  RETURNING teacher_exam_attempts.total_score, teacher_exam_attempts.max_score, teacher_exam_attempts.percentage 
  INTO v_result;

  RETURN jsonb_build_object(
    'success', true,
    'total_score', v_result.total_score,
    'max_score', v_result.max_score,
    'percentage', v_result.percentage
  );
END;
$function$
